name: H.A.R.P.Y
description:
H.A.R.P.Y is a programme iniated by a espionage organization to test their new spy robot.

The Spy robot H.A.R.P.Y will be placed in a simualted enviroment with a bunch of security bots.It will be tested for its capability.The threat level of the room increases with time.Collect data blobs to reduce threat level and survive as long as possible!
